original_text: The rest were to get there on planks or on other pieces of the ship. In this way everyone reached land safely.
korean_text: 그 남은 사람들은 널조각 혹은 배 물건에 의지하여 나가게 하니 마침내 사람들이 다 상륙하여 구조되니라

sentences.original_text: The rest were to get there on planks
sentences.korean_translation: 나머지 사람들은 널빤지를 타고 그곳에 가야 했습니다

sentences.original_text: or on other pieces of the ship
In this way everyone reached land safely
